name: Dotsense chacha
body:
.sense for the HTC ChaCha

+Data
+GPS
+GPU
+Front+Back Camera

-WiFi
-Bluetooth
-Backlight Keyboard

Future Plans-
+HTC ChaCha stock Lockscreen
+HTC ChaCha stock Homescreen

Have a look and see what you can add please.

-NOTE- This is not the full source just the folder which is required for flashing.

-ANOTHER GREAT NOTE-
If you download beware that the current work may not be safe and any ChaCha bricks is your fault.


Thanks Luke Arran
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
